sec.title: Instructions for two-person operation
sec.p: When there is a need for an operator or a helper to work on the rig in the working area or danger zone, and this involves activation of one or several machine functions, such work shall only be done under the following conditions, and these requirements shall be added in the maintenance manual:

list-item.label: a)
list-item.p: there shall always be two people present, both being fully instructed on the safety issues. One of them shall supervise the safety of the service personnel doing the work;

list-item.label: b)
list-item.p: the supervisor shall be experienced in the operation of the machine;

list-item.label: c)
list-item.p: the supervisor shall have immediate access to an emergency stop in all situations;

list-item.label: d)
list-item.p: the area where the service work is to be carried out shall be properly illuminated;

list-item.label: e)
list-item.p: communication between the service person and the supervisor at the main operator's position shall be established in a reliable manner;

list-item.label: f)
list-item.p: only when the rig is shut down completely and the means of starting are isolated is a person allowed to perform repair and maintenance work alone on the rig.
